features: 【Unique Flower Design】This Stationary Paper and Envelopes Set contains 3 different flower designs. Each style contains 8 envelopes & 16 pieces of writing paper. The lined letter writing paper with some flower decoration and vintage background makes this set clear but elegant in writing.
【High Quality Printable Writing Paper】Letter Writing paper is made of high quality paper that can perfectly meet your handwriting or printing needs. Safety, recycle, non-toxic & environment friendly.

【All Occasions】Perfect for wedding invitation, placeholding, Christmas music sheet, handwriting, bless message & much more. Start writing your old-fashioned letters on Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Easter or any occasion!
【Sizable Space】This Vintage Floral Stationary Paper and Envelopes Set has a sizable space in the center to add text, pictures, drawings, and heartfelt messages.
【Stationery Paper And Envelopes Set Dimensions】Stationery Paper in 8.5×11 Inch; Sealing envelopes in 4.7×8.7 Inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The paper and designs are just lovely. Works well with my glass pens. Makes writing more enjoyable. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are beautifully craftedespecially with the antique look. The lines on paper are far apart so if you tend to write long letters, these may not be for you; but if you just want a quick hello and breifing on what's going on, they are great. Again, big space between lines, but beautiful, the only drawback is that the back of the paper is white. Overall, great for the price and very pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the paper
reviews.reviewText: Super pretty writing paper, good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my wife. She liked them. Showed me how proud she was how the way her letter turned out. However me being the one who has to pay for everything I would have been happy with the stationary from the dollar store. Happy Wife Happy Life is what they say. So here we are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set is very pretty. Only thing I might change is to add lines on both sides. I would however purchase this item again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish more stationary was the size and not so tiny
reviews.reviewText: Every time I seem to buy stationary it's the very small piece of paper at the very small envelopes. The people that I'm writing for need large writing and I can't put a whole lot on teeny tiny papers. These pages are large enough to write a good size letter and nice block formation or cursive so your elderly persons can read easier. The family I sent this to really enjoy the different flowers and envelope sets along with my wax seal. I would highly recommend these over other stationery on Amazon that seems to be small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Care About Others
reviews.reviewText: To tell others that I care about them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No one Writes Letters Anymore
reviews.reviewText: Really pretty paper. Thick sheet for writing. No one writes letters anymore. I've started to write letters to family, especially older members that don't have access to email or a computer.I am a bit disappointed that the sheets are only printed on one side. But having matching envelopes makes up for it.
